Ingredients.Ingredients: One 3-inch strip orange zest plus more, for serving
3 ounces ginger beer or ginger ale

Instructions.Instructions: Combine the cranberry juice, lime juice, agave and orange zest in a cocktail shaker. Add the vodka and elderflower liqueur if using and 2 cups of ice, then shake for 10 seconds. Strain into two or four 6-ounce martini glasses and finish each with ginger beer and an orange twist.
